response.reasoning: "Assisted suicide" is a correct and widely used term in this context.
NATRE is a correct acronym for the National Association of Teachers of Religious Education.
Adding a comma before "so" would improve formality and clarity when connecting two independent clauses.
"All of the Gospels" is grammatically correct, though "All the Gospels" is a more concise and equally valid stylistic choice.
"Imago Dei" is a correct Latin theological term and is used appropriately in this context.
